description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+42 vs AC; 3d12+10 damage, and the target loses two healing surges.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+41 vs AC; 2d12+10 damage.

At-Will

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When an enemy moves into a square adjacent to bahamut, at-will

+41 vs Reflex; 2d12+10 damage, and the target is grabbed. Failed Escape Attempt: Bahamut automatically hits the target with his bite attack.

Cold

Minor, Recharge 5

Close blast 10

+40 vs Reflex; 4d12+10 cold damage, and the target is pushed 6 squares and immobilized (save ends); Miss: Half damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares.

Minor, Recharge 5

Close blast 10

+40 vs Fortitude; 4d12+10 damage, and 15 ongoing damage (save ends). ; Aftereffect: Ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Polymorph

Minor, Recharge 5

Close blast 10

+40 vs Will; the target is stunned, weakened, and transformed into fine mist (save ends all). While the target is in this mist form, enemies can move through the target's space freely.

Encounter ✦ Cold

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Bahamut's breath weapon recharges, and he uses polar breath, disintegration breath, or misty breath.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 20

Targets enemies; +38 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Bahamut's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Trigger: When bloodied

When Bahamut becomes bloodied, he discorporates and is unable to take physical form for a time.

system.biography:
HP 1316; Bloodied 658 ; see also bloodied breath and discorporation
Resist 20 cold, 20 fire Immune attacks by creatures of lower than 20th level 		Init +24 | AP 2 | Save +5; whenever an attack causes an effect on Bahamut that a save can end, he immediately makes a saving throw against that effect. Bahamut also makes saving throws at the end of his turn as normal.
AC 52Fort 47Ref 45Will 47
Speed 10, fly 15 (hover), teleport 10
Ability ScoresStr 31 (+28)
Con 33 (+29)		Dex 23 (+24)
Int 27 (+26)		Wis 28 (+27)
Cha 29 (+27)
Languages Supernal
Alignment Lawful Good
Skills Arcana +31, Athletics +33, Diplomacy +32, Endurance +34, Heal +32, History +31, Insight +32, Intimidate +32, Religion +31Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 37 | Insight 42
